name: Pork and Bell Pepper Stir-Fry
ingredients: 3 medium green peppers, about 4 ounces each
6-8 servings leftover roast pork loin, julienned or cubed

instructions.en: Cut green peppers and onion into large chunks.
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte zelené papriky a cibuľu na veľké kúsky.
instructions.ja: ピーマンと玉ねぎを大きめに切ります。

instructions.en: Heat butter and oil in a very large skillet on medium-high heat.
instructions.sk: Na veľkej panvici rozohrejte maslo a olej na stredne vysokom ohni.
instructions.ja: 大きめのフライパンで中高温でバターと油を熱します。

instructions.en: Add peppers, onion, garlic, and pork. Stir-fry until everything is nicely browned.
instructions.sk: Pridajte papriky, cibuľu, cesnak a bravčové mäso. Smažte za stáleho miešania, kým všetko pekne nezhnedne.
instructions.ja: ピーマン、玉ねぎ、ニンニク、豚肉を加えます。全体がきつね色になるまで炒めます。

instructions.en: Season to taste with salt and pepper.
instructions.sk: Dochuťte soľou a korením podľa chuti.
instructions.ja: 塩コショウで味を調えます。
